about_the_game:
Black Light Kills

In a town shaken by mysterious disappearances, Aiden finds himself on a nightmarish journey. Losing his grip on reality, he must face terrifying creatures and unravel mysterious events. The answers lie buried within horrifying secrets.

Game Features:

  • Two Different Endings Await You: The story can lead to two different endings based on the events you experience throughout the gameplay.

  • Blurred Storyline: Aiden's mental turmoil will draw you into a deep narrative.

  • Chilling Atmosphere: The quiet yet disturbing town will push you closer to the edge of madness with every step.

  • Clues: Carefully examine every detail to uncover the town's dark secrets.

  • Sensitivity to Mental Breakdown: Aiden's mental deterioration deepens with environmental changes, causing you to continuously question the nature of reality.

  • Impactful Sound and Visual Design: Atmospheric sound effects and dark visuals will ensure that tension and fear are at their peak with each step.

  • Psychological Tension: Hidden dangers and mind games will lead Aiden to question his sanity.

  • Mind-Bending Experiences: Expect to encounter disorienting events and hallucinatory visions that challenge your perception of reality.

  • Immersive Soundscapes: The game features meticulously crafted sound design that enhances the psychological horror experience, keeping you on edge.

  • Loneliness and Isolation: The desolate corridors and abandoned rooms intensify feelings of solitude and isolation.FEAR IS ONLY OUTSIDE BUT ALSO LURKING WITHIN AIDEN'S MIND. ARE YOU READY FOR THIS JOURNEY?

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains graphic depictions of violence, unsettling imagery, and intense psychological scares. Viewer discretion is advised.

Black Light Kills - Official Launch Trailer

name: Black Light Kills

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64-bit / Windows® 8 64-bit / Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-2500 @3.3 GHz / AMD AMD Phenom II X6 1055T
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 / AMD Radeon™ HD 7850 (2GB VRAM)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050TI (4 GB) / Radeon RX 570 (4 GB)

short_description: Welcome to the darkness of the town; here, you walk a fine line between reality and dreams, questioning your sanity. Black Light Kills takes you deep into Aiden’s mind, where nightmares begin as reality fades.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Bulgarian, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Czech, Swedish, Bosnian, Georgian, Hindi, Icelandic
*languages with full audio support
